name: Ernest Chooses His Own Adventure
description:
Ernest P. Worrell is about to have a very strange day, and you're going along for the ride!  Take control of the legendary redneck and explore multiple storylines with twenty different endings!  Wield the power of the Diareaper.  Defend the treeless land of Lower Botswana.  Or even save Christmas....again!

It's the adventure of a small town janitors/cook/basketball star/ janitor again's lifetime, Knowhutimean?

( By @MoviesErnest and @Breadknight, Follow them on Twitter, they're both the same person, but like to think they worked together somehow anyway!)
